title: About Me
subtitle: Builder of management systems and virtual fidget spinners
metaDescription: Get to know the person behind the code.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: The principles that guide my work and approach to problem-solving.

items.title: Innovation
items.description: Pushing boundaries and exploring new technologies to create cutting-edge solutions.

items.title: Quality
items.description: Building robust, maintainable code that stands the test of time.

items.title: Collaboration
items.description: Working closely with teams to understand needs and deliver exceptional results.

items.title: Learning
items.description: Continuously expanding knowledge and staying current with industry trends.

items.title: Efficiency
items.description: Optimizing processes and code to deliver faster, better results.

items.title: User-First
items.description: Designing experiences that prioritize user needs and accessibility.

items.text: Build scalable web applications from concept to deployment, focusing on performance and user experience.
Design and implement complex system architectures that handle high traffic and maintain reliability.
Optimize existing applications for better performance, security, and maintainability.
Start with deep understanding of requirements and user needs before writing any code.
Build iteratively with frequent feedback loops to ensure alignment with goals.
Document thoroughly and maintain clean, testable code for long-term success.

funFacts: I once debugged a production issue while on a roller coaster
My first computer was a Commodore 64
I can recite the entire Monty Python and the Holy Grail script
I've written code in 15 different programming languages

contactCTA.text: If this sounds like someone you'd like on your team, let's talk.
